Teach me to kneel

Teach me to hold hands with everyone I meet. Let me glimpse again within our everyday appearance divine childen.1 Let me recognize brothers and sisters our family likeness. Teach me to use simple things as the tools of love. Give me willingness to do any chore for the sake of love. Let me share my toys for joy. It is a privilege to help friends. Lets play!

Author: Evelyn Underhill

Sources: 1. From House for All Sinners and Saints podcast 1/24/2015
